definition: to help/to assist/to support/for sb (i.e. as a help)/hired (as worker)/side (of pail, boat etc)/outer layer/upper (of a shoe)/group/gang/clique/party/secret society

sentences.english: The ship struck an iceberg, which tore a huge hole in her side.
sentences.chinese: 船碰在一座冰山上，船幫被撞出一個大洞。

sentences.english: She fell heavily, striking her head against the side of the boat.
sentences.chinese: 她摔倒了，頭重重地碰在船幫上。
